pages.title: Silkworm
pages.text: Silkworms grow slowly over time and produce Silk Cocoons.$(br)This breed is surprisingly hostile and territorial, attacking any other nearby silkworms.$(br)They can be hatched from eggs that can be found by breaking leaves in the same way you would to get saplings.

pages.name: Silkworm
pages.text: You can right-click them with leaves to speed up their growth and cause them to drop more.
